property.expression: fn:concat(' terminalId ', get-property('terminalId'), ' supervisoryId ', get-property('supervisoryId'), ' uri.var.channelId ', get-property('uri.var.channelId'), ' tranCode ', get-property('tranCode'), ' dateTime ', get-property('dateTime'), ' stan ', get-property('stan'), ' uri.var.ucompany ', get-property('uri.var.ucompany'), ' uri.var.service ', get-property('uri.var.service'), ' uri.var.consumerType ', get-property('uri.var.consumerType'), ' consumerNumber ', get-property('consumerNumber'))
property.name: logIds
